title: Israeli military tech start-ups cash in on two years of war
summary_full: While Israel has faced sharp criticism over its war in Gaza, start-up executives say foreigners are eager to buy systems developed and tested on the battlefield.
summary_public: While Israel has faced sharp criticism over its war in Gaza, start-up executives say foreigners are eager to buy systems developed and tested on the battlefield.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Israel has faced sharp criticism over its war in Gaza
